projects.title: Flexbox Playground
projects.description: A web app that allows you to experiment with and understand how flexbox works. Note that while this app will technically load on a phone, it's definitely intended to be used on a larger screen and probably won't work very well on smaller devices.

projects.title: Box Shadows
projects.description: Interactively generate box shadows and view the code necessary to add it to your site.

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: A web app that will solve sudoku puzzles for you. It uses a variation of a brute force search algorithm with backtracking to solve even the hardest puzzles.

projects.title: Catholic AF
projects.description: A friend and I built a website where we design and sell snarky Catholic stickers and apparel and donate the proceeds to Catholic charities. Completely real, totally a joke. Check it out.

projects.title: Virtual Keyboard
projects.description: A web app that displays a keyboard (pure CSS/HTML) and lights up the keys you are typing as you press/hold them. Super fun, totally pointless. Try it out! (Doesn't work on phones yet... sorry)

projects.title: Virtual Piano
projects.description: Similar to the keyboard, this app that displays a section of a piano. Keys are assigned to letters on the keyboard, and when you press them the corresponding piano key lights up and emits the tone for that note. Turn up the sound!

projects.title: convert-color-cli
projects.description: A CLI tool that can convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL.

projects.title: object-has-value
projects.description: A function to efficiently test whether an object contains the specified value. Very useful when filtering arrays of objects.

projects.title: uniq-by
projects.description: Removes duplicates in an array based on a given key. Like lodash _uniqBy but without needing to pull in all of lodash.

projects.title: uniq
projects.description: Super fast implementation for removing duplicates from an array.

projects.title: LSU Phoenix Alumni Association
projects.description: I designed and built the new website for the LSU Phoenix Alumni Association.

projects.title: Electron Highlighter Syntax
projects.description: A dark syntax theme for the Atom text editor. I've invested far more time into this color theme than I care to admit.

projects.title: VS Code Electron Highlighter Syntax
projects.description: The same syntax theme, but for VS Code.

projects.title: Hyper Electron Highlighter
projects.description: The same syntax theme, but for Hyper (the terminal app).
